name: NSAnimatablePropertyContainer
desc: A set of methods that defines a way to add animation to an existing class with a minimum of API impact.

items.name: func animator() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a proxy object for the receiver that can be used to initiate implied animation for property changes.

items.name: var animations: [NSAnimatablePropertyKey : Any]
items.desc: Sets the option dictionary that maps event trigger keys to animation objects.

items.name: func animation(forKey: NSAnimatablePropertyKey) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the animation that should be performed for the specified key.

items.name: static func defaultAnimation(forKey: NSAnimatablePropertyKey) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the default animation that should be performed for the specified key.
